title: What Is Maximal Extractable Value (MEV)? What Blockchain Miners Need To Know
description: MEV hinges on the fact that miners and other participants in the validation process can reorder and manipulate transactions for their own personal gain.

title: Ethereum ($ETH) Whale Quietly Snaps Up 613 Billion $PEPE Tokens
description: In a significant move, a large Ethereum ($ETH) whale has funneled over $1 million into the meme-inspired cryptocurrency $PEPE, a rival to other meme tokens including $SHIB, in the span of a month as it keeps accumulating.
